name: Oopsie daisy crusaders
description:
An evil cult suspected to have come from maxlothantax has made its way into good city, they now have their own military and are planning to attack bad city.

but Skillit isnt having any of that so he decides to gather his friends to stop this cult once and for all !

left and right to move

CRTL is jump

ALT is special

Have fun you guys!
